title: not possible to edit a txt file after creating it
body:
### expected behaviour
when you create a new txt file on owncloud, it should be possible to edit it

### actual behaviour
after creating the txt file, being this empty, by clicking on it, instead of opening the txt within owncloud, it is offered to us: "open", "save" or "cancel"

### steps to reproduce
1. log in to oc
2. click on new > text file
3. give a name, test.txt
4. once it is created, click on test.txt
5. instead of openning it, a dialog is shown, see image attached
6. by refresh, it does work

### server configuration
operating system:

web server:
acceptance testing, "version":"4.93.10","versionstring":"5.0 beta 1
